instructions: At checkout, click Apple Pay. You can change the credit card, shipping address, or contact information before completing your purchase. Complete the purchase. Mac with Touch ID: Use Touch ID . Only one user account on your Mac can use Touch ID on the Mac to complete purchases with Apple Pay. Other user accounts must use iPhone or Apple Watch. iPhone: Double-click the side button, then authenticate with Face ID on iPhone X; or use Touch ID on other models. Apple Watch: Double-click the side button.
